from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType, TimestampType, StringType, IntegerType, FloatType, DoubleType, BooleanType, StructType, StructField, ArrayType, MapType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number, rank, dense_rank, lag, lead, ntile
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.avro.functions import from_avro, to_avro
from pyspark.sql.streaming import DataStreamReader, DataStreamWriter
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.catalog import Catalog
from pyspark.sql.column import Column
from pyspark.sql.group import GroupedData
from pyspark.sql.pandas.functions import pandas_udf

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

try:
    logInfo("Starting HR Personnel SubArea dimension setup")
    
    # Get storage account 
    storage_account = mssparkutils.notebook.run('archive/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
    logInfo(f"Using storage account: {storage_account}")
    
    # Fix the path
    storage_account = storage_account.rstrip('/')
    delta_table_path = f"abfss://odw-curated@{storage_account}/saphr/pbi_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea"
    logInfo(f"Delta table will be created at: {delta_table_path}")
    
    # Create/refresh view
    logInfo("Creating view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea")
    spark.sql("""
    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea AS
    SELECT
        RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.PersonnelSubAreaCode, a.PersonnelSubArea) AS dim_personnel_subarea_key,
        a.PersonnelSubAreaCode,
        a.PersonnelSubArea
    FROM
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT
            PSubarea AS PersonnelSubAreaCode,
            CASE PSubarea  
                WHEN 'P210' THEN 'Digital' 
                WHEN 'P205' THEN 'Perf Com & Ops' 
                WHEN 'P515' THEN 'EST/Central Ops'
                WHEN 'P610' THEN 'Knowledge'
                ELSE PersonnelSubarea
            END AS PersonnelSubArea
        FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR	  
    ) a 
    """)
    logInfo("Successfully created view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea")
    

    # Drop the table if it exists
    logInfo("Dropping table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea if it exists")
    spark.sql("""
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea
    """)
    logInfo("Table dropped or did not exist")
    
    # Create table from view with specified location
    logInfo("Creating table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea from view with specified location")
    spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea
    USING delta
    LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
    AS SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Personnel_SubArea
    """)
    

except Exception as e:
    logError(f"Error in Personnel SubArea dimension setup: {str(e)}")
    logException(e)
    raise e
finally:
    logInfo("Flushing logs")
    flushLogging()
